question: The "Jose Armando Bermudez National Park" is located in which country?
explanation: The Jose Armando Bermudez National Park is located in the Cordillera Central mountain range of the Dominican Republic. This national park is a very high area with cold and cool temperature during most of the year. This national park supports the Hispaniolan pine forests ecoregion of the Tropical and subtropical coniferous forests biome.
